data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 75,800 people living in Sangre Grande through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sangre Grande, Trinidad and Tobago

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Sangre Grande. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Sangre Grande, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Sangre Grande, Trinidad and Tobago into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sangre Grande
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sangre Grande, Sangre Grande, Trinidad and Tobago.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Sangre Grande, Trinidad and Tobago.
Father, help your children in Sangre Grande, Trinidad and Tobago find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Sangre Grande, Trinidad and Tobago so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
